headers.envelope-from-line: From css at leversuch.co.uk Tue Dec 6 07:15:37 2005
headers.subject: [css-d] Image layout

quote.quotepara: Many apologies for this. Due to a malfunction with Outlook I have lost a bunch of emails from the discussion forum. Couple of weeks ago there was an interesting thread on image layout. I am trying to put together a gallery for a client with thumbnails laid out in rows and columns which will open out into a new page when clicked. Images held in a MySQL db of course.
Any one remember the links or have suggestions.

body.para: Have you looked through the archives? The private[1] one is probably best because you can view by thread.
